participant_1.name: Ethan Johnson
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven with a keen sense for business. Enjoys luxury and seeks success.
participant_1.background: i plan to go to business school next year. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. my parents are very wealthy bankers.

participant_2.name: Margaret Smith
participant_2.personality: Warm and nurturing, with a strong love for family. Resilient and creative, finding joy in simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: i'm retired and living the great life. i've amazing children and grandchildren. i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes.
